# toolbar

**Instance Property**

The window’s toolbar.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var toolbar: NSToolbar? { get set }
```

## Discussion

For more information about toolbars, see [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSToolbar].

## Managing Toolbars

- **toggleToolbarShown(_:)**: Toggles the visibility of the window’s toolbar.
- **runToolbarCustomizationPalette(_:)**: Presents the toolbar customization user interface.
